title: TF1 Group - Wikipedia
snippet: The group was formed after TF1 was privatized in April 1987 in which the channel was launched back on 6 January 1975 twelve years prior. title: TF1 Group
snippet: Founded in 1975 by the French Government and privatized in 1987, the TF1 group is the owner of TF1, Europe’s largest private TV channel. ... TF1 (La Une) was originally established under government ownership in 1947.

title: TF1 - Wikipedia
snippet: On 16 April, its president, Francis Bouygues, presented a check of three billion francs to the government, completing the privatisation of TF1. TF1's current logo was unveiled on February 2nd, 1990. It launched a news network, La Chaîne Info (LCI), in 1994. The channel was available in Italy ...
